name: Fleshwater
description: '''Fleshwater''' is an American [[rock music|rock]] band formed in [[Boston]] in 2017. The band was formed by Anthony DiDio (vocals, guitars), and Matt Wood (drums) of [[Vein.fm]], with their Vein.fm bandmate Jeremy Martin (bass) and Marisa Shirar (lead vocals, guitars, keyboards) joining two years after the band's formation. The band currently consists of DiDio, Shirar, Martin, Jonathan Lhaubouet (guitars), and Josian Ramos (drums).
